Description: We are looking for a skilled 'WordPress Website Developer' with expertise in end-to-end development, deployment, and maintenance of dynamic websites. Join our innovative team and contribute to creating outstanding digital experiences. Key Responsibilities: 1. Website Development: Design, develop, and maintain responsive WordPress websites that align with business objectives and user needs. 2. Customization: Customize themes, plugins, and templates to meet specific project requirements. 3. Integration: Implement third-party APIs, payment gateways, CRM tools, and other integrations as needed. 4. Optimization: Ensure website performance, speed, and security are up to industry standards. 5. Deployment: Manage end-to-end deployment, including hosting, DNS configuration, and server management. 6. Troubleshooting: Debug and resolve technical issues promptly. 7. Collaboration: Work closely with designers, content creators, and other team members to deliver cohesive solutions. 8. Maintenance: Provide ongoing support, updates, and enhancements to existing websites. Required Skills & Qualifications: Technical Expertise: - Proficiency in WordPress, including custom theme and plugin development. - Strong knowledge of PHP, HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, and MySQL. - Familiarity with modern frameworks like React, Vue.js, or Angular is a plus. Deployment Experience: - Hands-on experience with version control systems (e.g., Git). - Proficient in server setup, hosting environments, and DNS configuration. - Knowledge of CI/CD pipelines is advantageous. Problem-Solving: - Ability to identify, diagnose, and resolve performance bottlenecks and security issues. Soft Skills: - Strong communication and teamwork skills. - Excellent time management and ability to meet deadlines. Preferred Qualifications: - Experience with SEO, accessibility standards, and analytics integration. - Understanding of cloud services like AWS, Google Cloud, or Azure. Who can apply 1. Candidates with minimum 1 years of experience. 2. Those who are from or open to relocate to Greater Noida and neighboring cities Other requirements B.tech Experience with SEO, accessibility standards, and analytics integration. Understanding of cloud services like AWS, Google Cloud, or Azure. Salary Annual CTC: ₹ 5,00,000 - 6,00,000 /year

JobTitle: As a Cinematographer at Bluntly Streaming, you will have the exciting opportunity to showcase your skills in video making, direction, video editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, photography, and Adobe Photoshop. Your creativity and technical expertise will play a crucial role in producing high-quality content for our streaming platform.
Description: Key responsibilities: 1. Collaborate with the content team to develop creative concepts and storyboards for video projects and direct it 2. Shoot and capture high-quality video footage using professional equipment and techniques. 3. Edit video footage to produce compelling and engaging content for our platform. 4. Utilize Adobe Premiere Pro and Adobe Photoshop to enhance video quality and visual appeal. 5. Ensure all video content meets brand standards and guidelines. 6. Stay up-to-date on industry trends and technologies to continuously improve our video production process. 7. Work closely with the post-production team to finalize and deliver completed projects on time. If you are passionate about cinematography and have a keen eye for detail, we want you to join our innovative team at Bluntly Streaming. Your talent and expertise will help us deliver exceptional content to our audience. Apply now to be a part of our dynamic team! Salary Probation: Duration: 1 month Salary during probation: ₹10,000 - 15,000 /month (only for freshers) After probation: Annual CTC: ₹ 2,00,000 - 3,00,000 /year Perks Informal dress code Free snacks & beverages Number of openings 2
